name: Tipaque® R-980
description: Tipaque® R-980 is a medium particle size rutile type titanium dioxide pigment produced by the sulfate process and has superior durability due to its crystal stabilization with aluminum. It shows the unique blueish tone due to its slightly smaller particle size. Tipaque® R-980 also shows ease of dispersion, excellent gloss and tinting strength due to its surface treatment with alumina and an organic compound. It is a multipurpose grade for versatile applications such as exterior paints where the maximum durability is regired, interior paints, printing inks and plastics.
